DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess antiviral activity when administered alone for 3 days or in combination with peginterferon and ribavirin for 12 weeks. This study will also evaluate the safety and tolerability of treatment with VCH-222 when given alone or in combination with peginterferon and ribavirin. The study will also evaluate the pharmacokinetic profile of VCH-222 in HCV infected subjects.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Multiple Ascending Doses of VCH-222 in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Infection
